Method Detail

getAvailablePositionSources

public byte[] getAvailablePositionSources()
Returns a set of identifiers for position sources that are available at this handset, but not necessarily used at the moment. The returned set is based on the priorities configured with PositioningControl.setPriorities(byte[]) and PositioningControl.getPriorities(). Hence, the returned set of identifiers is always a subset of these priorities. Position sources which are not part of these priorities are not even checked for availability, because of performance reasons. Also note that the returned set will be empty, if positioning is not enabled, i.e. prior to calling PositioningControl.startPositioning() or after calling PositioningControl.stopPositioning().

Returns:
A set of identifiers for available position sources at this handset.

getCurrentPositionSource

public byte getCurrentPositionSource()
Returns an identifier for the position source that is currently used for positioning, compare PositioningConstants.POS_SRC_SIMULATOR, PositioningConstants.POS_SRC_EMBEDDED_GPS, PositioningConstants.POS_SRC_LOCAL_CELL_ID, ...

Returns:
An identifier for the position source that is currently used for positioning.

isConnected

public boolean isConnected()
Checks whether the TraXClient is currently connected with the Aloqa Server.

Returns:
true If the TraXClient is currently connected with the Aloqa Server.

isPositionAvailable

public boolean isPositionAvailable()
Checks whether a valid position is available for the TraXClient.

Returns:
true If a valid position is available for the TraXClient.
